All rights reserved. @@ -639,1 +639,4 @@ - * Returns the total number of compressed bytes input so far. + * Returns the total number of compressed bytes input so far, discarding + * the 32 highest order bits, as if the {@link #getBytesRead()} + * method was called followed by a narrowing conversion from long + * to int. @@ -641,3 +644,3 @@ - *

Since the number of bytes may be greater than - * Integer.MAX_VALUE, the {@link #getBytesRead()} method is now - * the preferred means of obtaining this information.

+ * @deprecated This method cannot safely return a result without a potential + * loss of information about the magnitude and sign of the returned value. + * Use the {@link #getBytesRead()} method instead when obtaining this information. @@ -645,1 +648,2 @@ - * @return the total number of compressed bytes input so far + * @return the total number of compressed bytes input so far, discarding + * the 32 highest order bits @@ -647,0 +651,1 @@ + @Deprecated(since = "23")
